title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: A coworkers strong desire to be top dog in your workplace could raise your own hackles today. If a colleagues smile seems more like theyre baring fangs than greeting you, sit down for a chat before you slide into open conflict. You might think theres not enough territory to satisfy both of you while the tactful Libra Sun forms a saber-rattling square with heavy-handed Pluto. Try to walk along the road to peace before you run head-on into an unnecessary and unproductive battle. Jimi Hendrix said, When the power of love overcomes the love of power, the world will know peace. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
